meta.title: Humartz
meta.subtitle: The Standard for Human-Made Art
meta.description: We verify, certify, and cryptographically anchor your art to the blockchain to prove it is human-made. Secure your art's legacy forever.

features.title: Authenticity in the Age of AI
features.description: A robust verification protocol combining expert human review with immutable blockchain technology.

items.title: Expert Human Review
items.description: AI detectors aren't enough. Our experts manually review your stems and project files to ensure authentic human creation.

items.title: Cryptographic Proof
items.description: Your certificate is hashed into a Merkle Tree and anchored to the Arbitrum blockchain, creating an unalterable timestamp.

items.title: IP Protection
items.description: We never publish your raw files. Only the cryptographic hash is public, keeping your stems private and secure.

items.title: Public Verification URL
items.description: Receive a unique 'humartz.com/cert' link for every track. Share it with sync-clients, publishers, or on your website.

stats.title: Preserving Human Creativity
stats.description: Join the movement of artists protecting their craft against AI generation. We are setting the standard for authenticity.

items.title: Peace of mind
items.description: Finally, a way to prove my beats are actually mine. The certificate looks professional and the blockchain proof is undeniable.

items.title: Essential for labels
items.description: As a small label, verifying demos is a nightmare. Humartz gives us a standard to trust the artists we sign.

items.title: Future proof
items.description: With AI music flooding Spotify, having a Humartz seal distinguishes my catalog as premium, human art.

items.title: Easy process
items.description: I just uploaded my stems, and 24 hours later I had my certificate anchored on Arbitrum. Super smooth.

faq.title: Verification Protocol FAQ
faq.description: Understand how we protect your music and why our hybrid manual-blockchain approach is the gold standard.

items.question: How do you verify the music?
items.answer: We use a 'Human-in-the-Loop' approach. You upload project stems or session files. Our audio engineers review them for signs of generative AI. Once approved, the data is hashed.

items.question: What is the Arbitrum Anchor?
items.answer: We take a digital fingerprint (Keccak256 merkle root hash) of your certificate and write it to the Arbitrum blockchain. This proves that your certificate existed at a specific time and hasn't been altered.

items.question: Are my files safe?
items.answer: Yes. We use enterprise-grade encrypted storage. We NEVER publish your raw stems or project files. Only the cryptographic hash is made public.

items.question: How long does verification take?
items.answer: Since we use manual review to ensure 100% accuracy, verification typically takes 24-48 hours.

items.question: Is this an NFT?
items.answer: No. You are not minting a token to trade. You are receiving a permanent, blockchain-backed certificate of authenticity for your records and reputation.

cta.title: Secure Your Discography Today
cta.description: Don't let AI dilute the value of your hard work. Get your tracks verified and give your listeners the proof they deserve.

meta.title: Humartz Blog
meta.description: Updates on AI music detection, copyright protection, and artist stories.

meta.title: Upload your files
meta.description: Upload your session files to a free file sharing service and send us the link for verification using the provided form.

benefits.title: SwissTransfer
benefits.description: Create a link by selecting the link option, and your email address for a verification code.

benefits.title: Support
benefits.description: For API, direct upload access, or upload-free verification, please contact us at contact@humartz.com or using the contact form

benefitsUpload.description: This is the fastest and most reliable way to send us your session files (stems, project files, bounces, exports…) for manual human review and blockchain anchoring.
If you don't want to upload your files to a third party, you can contact us to schedule a remote video-review session with one of our experts.
Use our contact form for bulk verification solutions if you have a Producer Membership, are a record labels or a publisher.

files.description_title_3: Step 3 – Upload The File We Are Certifying
files.description_title_4: And wait for our review ! We will get back to you shortly with the certification results.
files.description_subtitle_1: Once uploaded, our team will review your submission and get back to you shortly.
files.description_subtitle_21: • A valid proof of identity (ID, passport, or driver’s license)
files.description_subtitle_22: • All original material including stems, MIDI files, audio recordings, and project files created during production
files.description_subtitle_23: • Any additional files that demonstrate the human creation process (notes, drafts, screenshots, etc.)
files.chooseFile: Select the folder from your computer that contains all required files, up to 5GB.
files.errorUpload: There was an error uploading your folder.
